data.title: Broadway Studio Orchestra
data.meta_description: Broadway Studio Orchestra music. The Drowsy Chaperone - Backing Tracks
data.text:
Full band backing tracks for The Drowsy Chaperone with music and lyrics by Lisa Lambert and Greg Morrison and book by Bob Martin and Don McKellar. Tracks are based on the Original Broadway orchestration by Larry Blank and are in the show keys (unless stated).

In purchasing the tracks you are waiving your right to the 14-day cooling off period as

Full band backing tracks for The Drowsy Chaperone with music and lyrics by Lisa Lambert and Greg Morrison and book by Bob Martin and Don McKellar. Tracks are based on the Original Broadway orchestration by Larry Blank and are in the show keys (unless stated).

In purchasing the tracks you are waiving your right to the 14-day cooling off period as defined by the Consumer Rights Act (2015). We would advise you to check the song you need matches the version you require by heading to our Youtube channel and listening to your track in full there before purchasing.
